replies.author: BlackCB.
replies.txt_content:
stupid2 发表于 2020-2-26 18:05
盔甲架的面向怎么怎么提取……尝试了data get @e[type=armor_stand,distance=..1] Facing 没有这个数据 ...
https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.c ... 7%E6%A0%BC%E5%BC%8F

直接给指令好了= =

execute rotated as @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,tag=xx] positioned 0 0 0 run summon minecraft:area_effect_cloud ^ ^ ^1 {Tags:[a]}
execute as @e[type=arrow] run data modify entity @s Motion set from entity @e[tag=a,limit=1] Pose

modify将药水云的postioned存储到箭矢的motion
